k_ele.e: 柳の下にいつも泥鰌はおらぬ
柳の下に何時も泥鰌は居らぬ

r_ele.r: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはおらぬ

sense.gloss: a fox is not taken twice in the same snare, there are no birds in last year's nest, there aren't always loaches under the willow tree

k_ele.e: 柳の下にいつも泥鰌はいない
柳の下に何時も泥鰌は居ない

r_ele.r: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはいない

sense.gloss: a fox is not taken twice in the same snare, there are no birds in last year's nest, there aren't always loach under the willow tree, good luck does not always repeat itself
scooping loaches, catching loach in a net

k_ele.e: どじょう掬いまんじゅう

r_ele.r: どじょうすくいまんじゅう

sense.gloss: steamed bun shaped like a loach catcher
x: どじょう掬い・どじょうすくい・1

sdata.j: いつも↑柳↑↓やなぎ↓の↑下↑↓した↓に↑泥鰌↑↓どじょう↓は↑居↑↓お↓らぬ。
sdata.e: A fox is not caught twice in the same snare.

sdata.j: ↑柳↑↓やなぎ↓の↑下↑↓した↓の↑泥鰌↑↓どじょう↓。
sdata.e: A fox isn't caught twice in the same snare.

words.word: 柳の下にいつも泥鰌はおらぬ
words.gloss: a fox is not taken twice in the same snare, there are no birds in last year's nest, there aren't always loaches under the willow tree
